SELECT b.properties_name, b.properties, b.outer_id, b.sku_id, b.price, b.real_price, a.title, a.pic_url, c.sku_name FROM tb_product a LEFT JOIN tb_sku b ON a.num_iid = b.num_iid LEFT JOIN tb_sku_k3_name c ON b.sku_id = c.sku_id
b.outer_id lIKE '%${outerId}%'
AND a.title like '%${title}%'
AND c.sku_name LIKE '%${skuName}%'
AND a.approve_status='onsale' AND b.quantity > 0 AND a.nick != 'saladliang'
ORDER BY ${sqlMap.order.toSql()}
SELECT a.*, b.sku_name skuName FROM tb_sku a LEFT JOIN tb_sku_k3_name b ON a.sku_id = b.sku_id WHERE a.num_iid = #{numIid}
